deck: His full name is Billy Tan Mung Khoybut he just goes with Billy Tan. He is a Malaysian comic book artist.
description: He broke into the industry by working for       Image Comics in the 90´s. Tan then moved on to      Marvel where he became the artist for the series     Uncanny X-Men.  He became the regular artist for the New Avengers Vol 1, then did a few numbers of Thor. Later this year (2010) Billy will draw the Shadowland series for Marvel in which    Daredevil stands in the spotlight. Now he´s assigned to be the penciler of Uncanny X-Force # 9 and 10, to be released in May 2011.
name: Billy Tan
